content:
I'm watching an OpenNotes webinar right now (I'm on their advisory board) about Emory Healthcare's use of OpenNotes and was pleased to see them brag about adding FHIR support to their Cerner portal last summer.

I'm sure the webinar will be available for replay.
pasted image
At this moment a patient is speaking about how she has SEVEN patient portals. One is her main portal; the other six are used to gather test results.

"I've had cases where my doctors disagreed, and the only time I've handled that well is when I had my OpenNotes to SHOW the other doctor." THAT, ladies & gentlemen, is patient EMPOWERMENT. "Increasing capacity to take effective action."
I am also listening to this webinar Dave. Rosie's presentation from the patient perspective was very interesting.
